Package com.harshrathore.finalproject.controller

Class BikeManagementSystemController

java.lang.Object
com.harshrathore.finalproject.controller.BikeManagementSystemController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/bms") public class BikeManagementSystemController extends Object
Controller class that handles the API endpoints for the Bike Management System.

  • Method Details

    • addBike

      @PostMapping("/save") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> addBike(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid com.harshrathore.finalproject.entity.Bike bike, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      This method handles the HTTP POST request for saving a new Bike record. It takes a Bike object as a JSON payload in the request body and performs validation. If there are validation errors, it returns a ResponseEntity with a 400 Bad Request status code and the corresponding error messages as the response body. If there are no validation errors, it adds the Bike record to the system and returns a ResponseEntity with a 201 Created status code, the newly added Bike object as the response body, and includes the location URI of the newly added Bike in the response headers.
      Parameters:
      bike - The Bike object to be saved.
      result - The binding result of the validation process.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity The HTTP response containing the result of the operation.

    • getBike

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public com.harshrathore.finalproject.entity.Bike getBike(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves a Bike record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the Bike to retrieve.
      Returns:
      Bike The Bike object with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      com.harshrathore.finalproject.service.BikeNotFoundException - If the Bike with the given ID is not found in the database.

    • deleteBike

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<com.harshrathore.finalproject.entity.Bike> deleteBike(@PathVariable Integer id)
      Deletes a Bike record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the Bike to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity The HTTP response indicating the result of the operation.
      Throws:
      com.harshrathore.finalproject.service.BikeNotFoundException - If the Bike with the given ID is not found in the database.

    • updateBike

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> updateBike(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid com.harshrathore.finalproject.entity.Bike bike, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Updates a Bike record identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the Bike to update.
      bike - The updated Bike object received as a JSON payload in the request body.
      result - The binding result of the validation process.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity The HTTP response containing the result of the operation. If there are validation errors, it returns a ResponseEntity with a 400 Bad Request status code and the corresponding error messages as the response body. If the Bike with the given ID is not found in the database, it throws a BikeNotFoundException. If the update is successful, it returns a ResponseEntity with a 201 Created status code and the updated Bike object as the response body.
